Strategy CEO: We Remain Confident Even If the Market Enters a Bear Cycle

Strategy CEO Phong Le said in a What Bitcoin Did interview on November 28, 2025, that accessing capital markets during a bear market is far more difficult than in a bull cycle, and the company can no longer raise dollars as easily as before. The launch of preferred products such as Stretch is intended to give MicroStrategy the ability to finance even when Bitcoin's price is flat or volatile. He noted that MicroStrategy has built a Bitcoin treasury framework over the past five years that can operate effectively across both bull and bear markets, and that the newly issued preferreds must undergo similar market "stress tests". Facing a potential new downturn, the company will continue paying dividends to steadily build investor confidence and pave the way for future capital raises, further solidifying its position as a Bitcoin treasury and credit-issuing institution capable of navigating full market cycles.
